posts.post_content: A one-man air defense for ground-bound green and red decks. Reach plus first strike plus 3 toughness means he blocks \*very\* well. Only reason he isn't worth a 5 is the need to have a red permanent in play to get his full power - this limits his use in some white-green decks.
posts.html:
A one-man air defense for ground-bound green and red decks. Reach plus first strike plus 3 toughness means he blocks *very* well. Only reason he isn't worth a 5 is the need to have a red permanent in play to get his full power - this limits his use in some white-green decks.
Report Abuse

Rating:

posts.post_content: This deserves more than a 3. Even without the red permanent ability, it's still a soldi-early game blocker that shuts down your opponents cheap flyers. I run four of these in my spectrum deck and the make for nice 3rd turn blockers.
